scripts.check-env: node -e "const dotenv = require('dotenv'); dotenv.config({ path: './functions/.env' }); const isDevBackend = process.env.IS_DEV === 'true'; dotenv.config({ path: './Front/.env' }); const isDevFrontend = process.env.REACT_APP_IS_DEV === 'true'; if (isDevBackend || isDevFrontend) { console.error('Deployment blocked: IS_DEV or REACT_APP_IS_DEV is set to true'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run dev --prefix functions" "npm run emulators" "npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run build:back
